OOC: Yes, I agree, Lurker, everything you said was correct, as usual, but w=
e have to realize that Dewboy is only an idiot. He can't help it. We have t=
o be nicer to idiots, because they often don't understand words like "long"=
 or "life." It's our responsibility to be patient and understanding, and be=
 a little more gentle to all of the rude idiots by showing that we care. I.=
E.: Dewboy, please don't be a stupid faggot. Please learn basic English and=
 stop taking shots at Airly for no reason. While you're at it, please stop =
being a dick. Thanks!

The preceding message was paid for by the neW WorLD =
orDer. Failure to respect will earn you no respect in return.

4 Life

  --=
--- Original Message -----
  From: Eric Bischoff
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.c=
om
  Sent: Monday, September 16, 2002 11:07 PM
  Subject: Re: OOC: Two year=
s ago....


  OOC:  Kyle, don't be a stupid faggot.  Maybe Airly meant "Lon=
g life to NBWRPG".  It makes perfect sense.  She's basically cheering to ha=
ve a long life in and for NBWRPG.

  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject t=
o the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
